Title: reinterpretAsFloat64
Description: Performs byte reinterpretation by treating the input value as a value of type Float64. Unlike CAST, the function does not attempt to preserve the original value - if the target type is not able to represent the input type, the output is meaningless.
x: value to reinterpret as Float64. (U)Int*, Float, Date, DateTime, UUID, String or FixedString.
Reinterpreted value x as Float64. Float64.
